definition: a mark or flaw that spoils the appearance of something (especially on a person's body), destroy or injure severely
details:
noun
- a mark or flaw that spoils the appearance of something (especially on a person's body)
= synonyms: blemish
verb
- destroy or injure severely
= synonyms: cut up
- make imperfect
= example: make imperfect
= synonyms: spoil
